sect1_slogan: Secret messagin' bottles for the crew.
sect1_description: Now that the King be eyein' us all, Tox is a simple method o' pipsquawkin' so's you can have a gar with the lads, without any suspicious sort o' peepin' by spies.
sect2_aboutbody:
Tox is constructed so's you can keep up with yer mates 'n' close ones, without havin' any sort o' privacy violations.
 While other shipmakers are beggin' a pretty pence for their services, Tox is free both gold-wise, and as in runnin'-free freedom.
 That is, yer free to do whatever you wish like with Tox.
sect3_messages_blurb: No sort o' drink in these, laddies, but they be the best of the secure communicatin' these days.
sect3_voice_blurb: Keep track of yer crew, with free long-talkin's to all yer mates.
sect3_video_blurb: I know not what manner o' witch they done tricked into givin' up her secrets, but they done did it.
sect4_principles: Speedy letterin', view-talkin' with all yer mates, and plenty a more
sect4_security_blurb:
Tox be's solemnly meditatin' on yer securin'.
With Royal-Quality encryption, you can sleep easy knowin' that the only lads eyein' yer messages are the ones you send them off at.
sect4_easy_blurb: Not like other methods o' secure messagin', Tox don't necessitate learnin' all sort o' witchcraft and witchery to use it. Tox comes fresh out o' the shipyard with simple-like workin' board, so you can be focusin' on your conversations.
sect4_freedom_blurb: Tox is both free for you to make a use of, and free for you to change. Yer completely free to both use and modify Tox to yer needins. And tackin' on, Tox will never harass you an' yer crew with adverrrtisements, or require you to pay up for features.
sect5_github: Want to pitch in? We're on GitHub. No voodoo wizardin' experience is necessitated.
sect6_developers: We're cool guys from all around the seas.
sect6_mailinglist: Keep yer scurvy crew up ta' date!
sect6_githubtoirc: Start yer own project and ask us on GitHub, or in the IRC!
